body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
We rely a lot on Temporal and would like to have more visibility into it. 

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A Grafana dashboard which builds visualisations on top of prominent datasources like Prometheus, Victoria Metrics etc.


**Additional context**
This Grafana dashboard should be published so that we can import it and use it. Other alternative is to have the `json` file somewhere for us to download

comments.body: We provide dashboards to get you started: https://github.com/temporalio/dashboards/

title: Build a grafana dashboard and publish it for others to use
